json.text: The Keshe Foundation
explained by the founder
The Keshe Foundation,
has been established to look after all the
interests of whatever is developed by me. And all the
developments of the present and the future will belong to the Foundation.
The Keshe Foundation is based
in Holland and it has been set up in the past 5 years,
for mainly to protect the intellectual rights, and financial
rights, of all the inventions and the patents,
and any literature which was written about the development of Space Technology
by Keshe Foundation, or by me as a person.
What ever will be developed in the future by... within the Keshe Foundation.
We've developed a lot of things. It is some 40-odd
years of research and development. We have
changed the course of Space technology, where we have made the
use of the propulsion obsolete. There is no need for
burning fuel the way it's done with the rocket propulsion...
we never see such a thing in the Universe.
And then we have developed, or in the process of developing, a one unified
medical application, which means one system to see that
we can treat all sorts of diseases:
cancer, FMS, MS, and all sorts of kinds of things.
That besides this development of the materials, we have developed
totally new materials unknown, like CO2 in the
solid state at room temperature.
And, there is the development of new energy systems, where
we can produce as much energy as you need, on demand.
We have a very simple system to keep
the human race independent of burning fuels.
And all these things are not talk...we have systems, we show
them, and we are developing more and more new systems, too...
and make them much easier to be achieved.
My name is Mehran Tavakoli Keshe. So, I am the founder of the Foundation,
or Stichting. And I
have developed a whole technology,
from basics, of the understanding the new concept of creation of
gravity and magnetic fields of the Earth.
And, over some twenty, thirty, years, have found parallel applications
in medical and different parts of the science for the same
discovery. The main problem
in the world of science, was that
nobody could understand how gravitational fields are created.
So, over 30 years of research, we have understood
how gravitational systems within a system like Earth is done.
We made systems to replicate the conditions, and we achieved the same
characteristics as the Earth, which is a system which
holds gravity and the magnetic field at the same time.
So, we brought the technology and the knowledge into the world of
medical application, and we see how easily certain diseases which
have been a big problem for the world of science, can be reversed,
or can be helped to be "reprocessed", as we call it.
We brought the same thing to the other side of material and the energy,
they receive the same operation. The reason that
you say that no other scientists have reached such a point,
is that a lot of scientists around the world are working to this target,
but, somehow, working on this
principle for some over, 30 years, 40 years,
it was bound for somebody to get there first,
and it looks like and as it is, we are the first to have done that. Americans are running a very small
program, or they ran a program in 2005,
under M2P2, they call mini-magnetosphere system,
which was in Washington University, and
Americans in other universities have looked at such a thing, but
we are the first organization which actually can produce a physical system.
We show them in operation. The system can be used
for different applications. Most of the things which we
thought impossible in the universe, or to be produced,
now we understand how gravity and magnetic fields can be produced at the same time in the same space
system, which is easy to produce. It's easy to produce
a protein out of the fresh air, as you call it
or to produce energy out of a very small system
which can give a few kilowatts, or a few thousands of kilowatts
at the same time, from the same system. The breakthrough comes
from understanding how to produce magnetic and gravitational fields
as a plasma, at the same time, in the same system,
in the same part of the same system.
The problem with the world of science has been, is that, over centuries
we saw the effect of the magnetic field of the Earth, we call it our atmosphere,
what we call the magnetosphere of the Earth,
and centuries years later, Newton understood
the property of gravity, or he explained gravity.
If the scientific world, or Man, at the same time
had discovered that the gravity and magnetic fields are the same,
we wouldn't have the misunderstanding that we have at the moment,
that we think gravity is a "holy grail" of science.
Gravity and magnetic fields are created
from the same material in the same place
in every dynamic system,
be it Earth, be it Sun, be it even the Galaxy.
So, what happens in reality, is magnetic fields
or what you call magnetosphere of the Earth, is created by the
repulsion forces of the field, and that attraction forces are
gravity or they get gravitated. It's like when you have a solid magnet.
In a solid magnet, you have a North and South. When you have a North and South,
they get attracted, that's gravitation. And when you have North and North
they repel each other, so that becomes the magnetic field
of repulsion force. In a plasma, or in the plasma of a proton
or electron, the same thing happens, but in a spherical shape,
the dynamic magnetic fields, they create magnetic field and
gravitational field at the same time, so every object which has got
a dynamic magnetic field is always spherical.
We don't see cylindrical objects in the universe, which have the
gravity and magnetic fields. Through the properties of reconnection of magnetic fields,
you'll find most of those objects are spherical.
And being spherical, they
also in turn have fields in which they interact, and they have gravity and magnetic fields,
what we call Magrav is the basis of what they call anti-gravity...
which is nonsense.
At the same time, you cannot have gravity and
not have a magnetic field, or what we call
magnetosphere.
The two are always together. One is repulsion, and one is attraction.
The systems we have developed and tested confirms the correctness of the theory.
The way we have found
how we can use this knowledge in medical applications,
is that, as a scientist, as a physicist,
I treat the body as a galaxy. In our understanding
how matter is like, what we call
as matters, or entities like earth or Sun operate within the galaxy,
and why the have such positions and the positions don't change,
the same thing happens on a smaller scale in the atoms and molecules which
make the cell of the human being.
If you understand the magnetic and gravitational fields, and how they position
themselves in respect to each other, and how the matter,
or entity, which has both positioned itself in respect to the other
of the same, then you can go into dimensions of
the body, treat the body as a galaxy, then you can
allow the body to go back and re-set itself
to the position as it was before an illness sets in.
So, the systems we make is rigid, and is a copy
of the body. The body of the person is flexible,
so, it tries to go back to its origin.
So, a lot of illnesses can be helped,
we don't call it treating, we don't call it curing...
it's setting the body back to it's original position, or co-processing.
This technology, on the medical side,
has been tested from 2004-2005
and at the moment, we are running some
30 - 40 trials literally around Europe, America
Canada, Middle East, Far East,
and in Belgium, in Holland, In Germany,
and in England. And we are learning that
we are at the point that we can make one system to be able to
be programmed to
reset anybody, any physical body,
from any illness.
And the signs are that we are very correct,
and the process is still going on.
I am born in a house where radiation
was part of the bread and breakfast, it was part of the food of the family.
My father was part of Phillips International, in medical
x-rays, so I was introduced to the world of
radiation at a very, very young age...seeing operation of the X-ray machines,
and everything else. And then I went to England
to study as an nuclear engineer,
and graduated from Queen Mary College as a nuclear engineer,
specialized in reactor system control
and technology. I could not see any future for what I wanted
within the industry, so I worked independently
financing the technology, and at the same time researching it.
Since 2002 more or less full-time I've spent on development
of the technology. But, it's been a long haul process.
We have communications from 14th of June
sorry, 14th June 1985 with Nasa
where we proposed this technology, and
we have developed the technology over years, in stages,
but in the past 5-6 years, it has been totally
a very meteoric scale-up that we are literally
developing everything, and different aspects of
the technology on a daily basis.
The whole of science will change from what we know, and what we learn,
in the very near future.. As I gave
a presentation to scientists in
the institute or organization known as "IMEC",
in 2005, a scientist

Flemish or Belgium federal

and the entity said, yes, it can be done.
Then we've start building prototypes; different prototypes over 4 or 5 years
and then we saw the first plasma spheres
in Belgium in mid 2006.
In 2007 it was carried out.
In 2008, with the invitation from the Iranian Government,
we built the first proper
gravitational external movement in Tehran, which has been tested.
And now the system is very floating, and we can fly,
we can make any movement as we like, and as we have said

We are preparing ourselves for such a demonstration.
We have shown the system to the scientists at the University of Ghent,
They have seen the physical system. We have shown the videos of

The Americans know what it is there,

Ahhh, nobody knows.
The reason I was arrested on board of a plane on a transit from

on transit in Toronto Airport, nobody knows.
I was interrogated, at one stage, for 2 days, 3 days.
Up to 12 agents and scientists

They've copied everything in my suitcase, in my dossier which I was carrying, as it was a scientific trip.
And they were so stupid that they

it's all in a hurry in that position.

We don't have a problem with nobody.
The thing is, as

When I talk, I make systems that shows the reality of what I talk.
I'm an engineer, so when I think of something, I can physically make the system and show it.
And, this is the problem with what I do.
When I say we can lift, we understand gravity, and magnetic fields...

It's the same as what we have done with medical applications.
In 2008, when there was a girl

Within 7 days, the girl recognized the mother, recognized the father,

To confirm that she is fully conscious, she recognizes the whole

that it was the right decision for us to allow that body, that human being,
to live, and not to be killed by present knowledge in the world of science.
The reason why we got it developed,
and I pushed ahead with the medical application of the technology,
is that we are very much running an operation of parallel or the same.
Any operation in space technology development organization

There would be more medicine than cargo to cover the headaches, the migraine attacks,

The whole concept is, that we are making one System in Space.
We do not need. Even if you come in touch with new diseases and germs,

All diseases are energy-based, or magnetic field based,

So, now there be one System, so that in Space we don't need to carry any medicine.

So, we are developing a technology, where in Space, one system

to be come across in Space, because Space is full of viruses.
So, it's the same with the food production.
We cannot carry food. At the moment, the Americans are planning

They have to foresee every drop of water

we being independent from Earth for supply.
The same goes with feeding people.

so, the theory of E=MC2 is totally out of the window.
